summary: Proper test at last! Seems to work ok apart from the really loud reversing - definitely needs a bit of vibration dampening but...
caption: Proper test at last! Seems to work ok apart from the really loud reversing - definitely needs a bit of vibration dampening but the stepping speed might also need tweaking. The belt drive looks inaccurate but watching the increments on the other side of the block go round it does seem to be more or less 1 step = 1 micron which is a good result.
